column4: Is anyone having problems with repos taking long time to update?
Mut80: I have download loaded with iso, im using a new install. just installing some software takes long thats all. Is there any extra repos avalible to add?
Mut80: I have download loaded with iso, im using a new install. just installing some software takes long thats all. Is there any extra repos avalible to add?
select a mirror closest to you from Software sources (System -> Administrtation)
